You tend to have a no-nonsense attitude.
Whenever something needs to get done, you're the one who makes sure it does.
You're always laser-focused on your objective, no matter what it is.
More often than not, you find yourself leading projects... even if you don't want to.
And when it comes to making decisions, you can sometimes agonize over the details.
But because of how carefully you think things through, you're usually confident in your choices.
Of course, being so serious can make it hard for you to lighten up and unwind at times.
A serious person like you will be...
